name: Zombie Words
description:
The zombie apocalypse has arrived, yet words still retain their power. Help the survivors fight off the zombie hoards by uncovering the puzzle words.

Correctly guessing a letter will empower the survivor to shoot, incorrectly guessing will give the zombies an opportunity to move closer. 

Reveal the puzzle word before the zombies reach the survivor in order to win. 
Earn points for solving and climb the leader board. 

18 different survivors to save, each with increasing difficulty. Save a survivor to unlock the next one. Unlock them all!
